snippet.title: The GameDev Story of Battle Gem Ponies (As of 2022)
snippet.description:
Check Out BGP for Yourself: https://linktr.ee/YotesMark
And to some special people watching this story unfold in realtime, thanks for believing in the project.

It's been a VERY long stay in development hell, but we're well on our way out. Hopefully this project will be all-wrapped up by 2024 and we'll be starting fresh on what's next.


Credits where credit is due:
Psyaryu's Avatar base was drawn by @RiddleLightning: https://twitter.com/RiddleLightning
Music by Euleom & Bluco:
https://soundcloud.com/eq7-2521
https://soundcloud.com/blucomusic
